divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from logansport approximately 9 pm In Logansport saw this strobing flashing craft Heading North westerly Direction. i was on High street in between Mall Road and Cass plaza Drive. It reminded me of a sighting i had on march 17 2010 when i saw a triangle craft that, suddenly started behaving like this strobing craft i saw this night of April 29th 2011. similar strobing lights. if not identical to those i saw that morning. also my 16yr old daughter did also see these lights, while she was waiting for me to get home from walmart, she was dropped off waiting on the porch, she left her key that night. it freaked her out too.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Logansport
There were no other sightings in Logansport on or around April 29th 2011
